attributes.action: bring in stricter rules on how MPs use taxpayers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the increasing abuse of taxpayers' money by some MPs, I would like to see tighter regulations brought in, and enforced. Some take advantage of laxness in the system. By having stricter rules, it should help them to be more community-minded.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
